name: Jamal Abo Mokh
description: Mathematics & CS Undergraduate | Experienced Software Engineer

summary.content: Full-stack engineer with strong .NET, Node.js and React/React Native background. Experienced with building event-driven microservices and distributed systems, with hands-on in CI/CD, testing automation and cloud deployments. Passionate about performance, developer experience, and clean architecture.

items.title: .NET & Back-End
items.description: ASP.NET, Web API, Hosted Services, Console Apps, Entity Framework Core

items.title: Event-Driven Logistics Platform
items.description: Microservices orchestrating orders, parcel routing, and label printing using .NET, through Azure & AWS with React Native app for warehouse.
highlights: Saga orchestration, resilient messaging, and observability
Expo RN app with react-query w/ graphql
On premise ql-700 controller for package labeling

items.title: Parking Alert System
items.description: Computer vision powered application that processes live CCTV feeds using deep learning to detect vehicles blocking entrances or parked illegally. Implemented real-time object filtering and decision algorithms to ensure accuracy. on premise audio controller triggers configurable audio notifications, transmitted via Bluetooth to portable speakers.

education.degree: B.Sc. in Mathematics with Computer Science

notes.content: This page was written in React & Tailwind, SSG using Gatsby and exported to PDF with Playwright through github actions artifacts.
